definition.EN: Of only average quality; not very good.
definition.TH: ปานกลาง, ธรรมดา

description: Used to describe something that is not especially good or bad, often with slight disapproval.

definition.EN: Acceptable in quality or quantity.
definition.TH: เพียงพอ, พอใช้ได้

description: Used when something meets a basic standard or requirement.

definition.EN: Severe, clear, or complete in appearance or effect.
definition.TH: เด่นชัด, รุนแรง, สิ้นเชิง

description: Often used when describing strong contrasts or harsh situations.

definition.EN: Someone who shows off their intelligence in an irritating way.
definition.TH: คนอวดฉลาด

description: Used humorously or critically to refer to a know-it-all.

definition.EN: A comparison made to explain something unfamiliar.
definition.TH: การเปรียบเทียบเพื่ออธิบาย

description: Used to simplify complex ideas by relating them to familiar concepts.

definition.EN: A general agreement among a group.
definition.TH: ความเห็นพ้องต้องกัน

description: Used in decision-making contexts where mutual agreement is reached.

definition.EN: Trying to appear more important or knowledgeable than one is.
definition.TH: เสแสร้ง, อวดดี

description: Used negatively to describe people or things that seem fake or showy.

definition.EN: Insects known for their loud buzzing sound, especially in summer.
definition.TH: จักจั่น

description: Mentioned in the context of hot weather or nature sounds.

definition.EN: Shyness or reluctance to attract attention.
definition.TH: ความขี้อาย

description: Describes a person who is timid or lacks confidence in social settings.

definition.EN: Uncomfortably hot.
definition.TH: ร้อนอบอ้าว

description: Used to describe oppressive heat or extremely warm weather.

definition.EN: Extremely serious or urgent.
definition.TH: ร้ายแรง, ฉุกเฉิน

description: Used to describe situations with severe consequences or emergencies.

definition.EN: With great care and thoroughness.
definition.TH: อย่างละเอียดถี่ถ้วน

description: Used to describe tasks done with extreme attention to detail.

definition.EN: Deserving praise and commendation.
definition.TH: น่าสรรเสริญ

description: Used to describe actions or goals that are admirable.

definition.EN: A narrow passage between or behind buildings.
definition.TH: ตรอก, ซอย

description: Common in urban settings, especially for small roads or walkways.

definition.EN: Doing something automatically due to routine.
definition.TH: ทำไปโดยความเคยชิน

description: Used when an action happens unconsciously because it’s a habit.

definition.EN: A passage between rows of seats or shelves.
definition.TH: ทางเดินระหว่างที่นั่งหรือชั้นวาง

description: Used in planes, theaters, churches, and supermarkets.

definition.EN: Having or showing the weaknesses of old age, especially mental decline.
definition.TH: ชราภาพ, ความจำเสื่อม

description: Used to describe elderly individuals with memory or cognitive issues.

definition.EN: An old man, often eccentric or grumpy.
definition.TH: ชายชรา (แปลกหรือบ่นบ่อย)

description: Used humorously or affectionately to describe an older man.

word: take something with a grain of salt

definition.EN: To view something with skepticism.
definition.TH: ฟังหูไว้หู

description: Used when advising not to take a statement too seriously.

definition.EN: About to happen, usually something negative.
definition.TH: ใกล้จะเกิดขึ้น

description: Used when something unpleasant is expected soon.

definition.EN: Allowing oneself to enjoy the pleasure of something.
definition.TH: ตามใจ, หมกมุ่น

description: Used when someone freely enjoys a desire, like food or entertainment.

definition.EN: Extremely unpleasant or horrifying.
definition.TH: น่ากลัว, เลวร้าย

description: Used to describe something shockingly bad or dreadful.

definition.EN: Extremely ugly or disgusting.
definition.TH: น่าเกลียดมาก, น่าขยะแขยง

description: Used to describe something visually or morally offensive.

definition.EN: Weighing heavily on the senses or spirit; harsh or authoritarian.
definition.TH: กดขี่, อึดอัด

description: Used to describe burdensome environments or governments.

definition.EN: A small sharp point or a tingling feeling.
definition.TH: ความรู้สึกเสียว, แหลมเล็กๆ

description: Used for physical sensations or emotional discomfort.

definition.EN: An alcoholic drink made from fermented apple juice.
definition.TH: น้ำแอปเปิ้ลหมัก

description: Mentioned when referring to beverages, especially in autumn or Western cultures.

definition.EN: A belief that is not true; false idea.
definition.TH: ความหลงผิด

description: Used in psychology or to describe someone out of touch with reality.

definition.EN: In a careful and private way to avoid notice.
definition.TH: อย่างสุขุม, อย่างระมัดระวัง

description: Used when someone wants to avoid drawing attention.

definition.EN: In a very close or personal way.
definition.TH: อย่างลึกซึ้ง, อย่างใกล้ชิด

description: Used to describe deep relationships or detailed understanding.

definition.EN: To sharpen or stimulate (an appetite or desire).
definition.TH: กระตุ้น, ลับให้คม

description: Often used in the expression 'whet the appetite' to mean increase interest.

definition.EN: Large, heavy, and powerful.
definition.TH: ใหญ่มาก, หนักมาก

description: Used to describe something physically heavy or metaphorically significant (e.g., hefty price).

definition.EN: Hesitating or doubting; not to be relied upon.
definition.TH: น่าสงสัย, ไม่แน่ใจ

description: Used when expressing uncertainty or lack of trust in something.

definition.EN: Fitting or joined together tightly.
definition.TH: ที่เชื่อมโยงกัน

description: Often used in mechanics, design, or systems where parts fit together.

definition.EN: An idea, belief, or opinion.
definition.TH: แนวคิด, ความเห็น

description: Used to refer to a general concept or idea, especially one not fully developed.

definition.EN: For a short time; in a moment.
definition.TH: ชั่วครู่, ในอีกไม่ช้า

description: Used when something is expected to happen very soon or lasts briefly.

definition.EN: A trick or deception.
definition.TH: เรื่องหลอกลวง

description: Used to describe something fake meant to deceive people.

definition.EN: To think about something deeply and carefully.
definition.TH: ใคร่ครวญ

description: Used when making an important decision or considering options.

definition.EN: To irritate intensely; infuriate.
definition.TH: ทำให้โกรธ, ทำให้หงุดหงิด

description: Used when someone is extremely annoyed by a person or situation.

definition.EN: In low spirits due to loss of hope or courage.
definition.TH: หมดกำลังใจ

description: Used to describe someone who feels hopeless or very discouraged.

definition.EN: Feeling a hopeless sense that a situation is so bad it requires drastic action.
definition.TH: หมดหวัง, สิ้นหวัง

description: Used when someone is willing to try anything due to urgency or fear.

definition.EN: Not even or regular in pattern or movement; unpredictable.
definition.TH: ไม่สม่ำเสมอ, ผันผวน

description: Used when referring to behavior or events that are inconsistent or unreliable.

definition.EN: An attempt to achieve a goal.
definition.TH: ความพยายาม

description: Used in formal contexts to describe serious efforts or undertakings.

definition.EN: A container for cigarette or cigar ash.
definition.TH: ที่เขี่ยบุหรี่

description: Used in contexts related to smoking or smoke areas.

definition.EN: The state of being extremely poor.
definition.TH: ความยากจน

description: Used in economic or social contexts to describe lack of financial resources.

definition.EN: A brief summary of a larger work.
definition.TH: บทสรุปย่อ

description: Used in film, literature, or presentation summaries.

definition.EN: The intrinsic nature or indispensable quality of something.
definition.TH: แก่นแท้, สาระสำคัญ

description: Used when identifying the core nature of a concept or object.

definition.EN: A state of peace and calm.
definition.TH: ความสงบเงียบ

description: Often used to describe a peaceful environment or mental state.

definition.EN: The quality of being honest and having strong moral principles.
definition.TH: ความซื่อสัตย์สุจริต

description: Used in ethical contexts or to describe trustworthy people.

definition.EN: Unwarranted or excessive.
definition.TH: เกินควร, ไม่เหมาะสม

description: Used to describe something inappropriate in amount or intensity.

definition.EN: Increased something, especially pressure or intensity, in stages.
definition.TH: เพิ่มขึ้นทีละน้อย

description: Used to describe gradual escalation of actions or effects.

definition.EN: About to happen very soon.
definition.TH: ใกล้เข้ามา

description: Used to describe events that are expected to occur shortly, often negative.

definition.EN: A torn piece of cloth or paper.
definition.TH: เศษผ้า, ขาดเป็นชิ้น

description: Used to describe something worn out or in ruins.

definition.EN: To spend money freely or extravagantly.
definition.TH: ใช้จ่ายฟุ่มเฟือย

description: Used when someone treats themselves by spending on luxury.

definition.EN: Lacking strong features or flavor; dull.
definition.TH: จืดชืด, ไม่น่าสนใจ

description: Used to describe food, people, or experiences that lack excitement.

definition.EN: Relating to an early stage of development; basic.
definition.TH: ดั้งเดิม, พื้นฐาน

description: Used to describe early human history or unsophisticated tools or behavior.

definition.EN: Extremely unpleasant or offensive.
definition.TH: น่ารังเกียจ

description: Used to describe people or things that are highly annoying or rude.

definition.EN: A loud and confused noise, especially by a crowd.
definition.TH: เสียงอึกทึก, การเรียกร้องเสียงดัง

description: Used when describing protests or public outcry.

definition.EN: Comfort in a time of distress.
definition.TH: ปลอบใจ, ความสบายใจ

description: Used to describe emotional relief or consolation.

definition.EN: To bite or chew persistently.
definition.TH: แทะ, กัดกิน

description: Used literally or to describe worry that continually bothers someone.

definition.EN: Slightly drunk.
definition.TH: มึนเล็กน้อย

description: Used to describe someone who is mildly intoxicated, often cheerful.

definition.EN: A solution or remedy for all difficulties or diseases.
definition.TH: ยาครอบจักรวาล, ทางแก้ปัญหาทุกอย่าง

description: Used often in a skeptical tone to criticize overpromised solutions.

definition.EN: To drink something, especially alcohol, quickly.
definition.TH: ดื่มรวดเดียวหมด

description: Used informally when someone quickly downs a drink.

definition.EN: With great speed or without thinking.
definition.TH: ผลีผลาม, เร่งรีบ

description: Used to describe rushing into something without caution.

definition.EN: To indulge in an emotion or situation, especially negative, without trying to change it.
definition.TH: จมอยู่กับ (ความรู้สึก)

description: Used when someone is absorbed in sadness, self-pity, or indulgence.

definition.EN: In exactly the same words as were used originally.
definition.TH: คำต่อคำ, ตามต้นฉบับ

description: Used when quoting something word-for-word.

definition.EN: The outward appearance of something, especially when the reality is different.
definition.TH: ลักษณะภายนอก, ความเหมือน

description: Used when something appears a certain way but isn’t necessarily true.

definition.EN: Lacking interest or excitement; dull.
definition.TH: น่าเบื่อ, ธรรมดา

description: Used to describe daily tasks or experiences that are unremarkable.
